extendedInfo.description: Enjoy a fully featured flight simulator in the palm of your hands. Infinite Flight offers the most comprehensive flight simulation experience on mobile devices whether you are a curious novice or an accomplished pilot. Fly a large selection of highly detailed aircrafts in regions across the world - day and night - in many atmospheric condition, and with a wide range of weight configurations. Improve your skills with our advanced camera and replay system, letting you scrutinize every portion of your flight.Features:â¢ 31 aircraft (17 included + 14 available for purchase)â¢ 10 regions each covering thousands of square kilometers (6 included + 4 available for purchase)â¢ All major airports with precise runway and taxiway layoutsâ¢ Flight planningâ¢ Instrument Landing System (ILS)â¢ Autopilot (supports Altitude, Heading, Throttle and Vertical Speed)â¢ Advanced replay systemâ¢ Time and weather conditionsâ¢ Weight and balance configurationâ¢ Introductory and takeoff flight lessonsâ¢ Logbookâ¢ Achievementsâ¢ And much more...Weâre a team of highly dedicated aviation and flight simulation enthusiasts and are eager for your feedback. If you donât like something, before rating, you can contact us directly using:â¢ email (contact@flyingdevstudio.com)â¢ twitter (@flyingdevstudio)â¢ Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/infiniteflightapp)â¢ in the "About" section of the simulator

reviews.title: Best simulator on hand held devices!
reviews.comment: This is by far the best simulator I have used on a phone and iPad. Very user friendly and great graphics. Thanks for the game.
reviews.author: Raiyan Rawoof

reviews.title: Aircraft Carrier?
reviews.comment: This app is impressive. Would it be possible to include an aircraft carrier which users can take off and land on? Thanks!
reviews.author: Harry Dale

reviews.title: Won\'t open on my Archos tablet
reviews.comment: The game doesn\'t open on my tablet. I played it on my friend\'s phone and liked it, so I bought it for myself, but can\'t use it. Please help, and I will change my rating to higher. Thanks
reviews.author: Sam Kandyba

reviews.title: Lovely, sensible, pilot friendly implementation. Worth it.
reviews.comment: Very nice flight model and I appreciate the automatic ILS frequency tuning. Could give X plane a run for its money. Good luck with this folks.
reviews.author: Ian C

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Would it be possible if u cud add concrete and asphalt because my game is not including those features. Thanks and ur game is super impressive.
reviews.author: Brady Margeson

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Would completely replace Xplane if you could add helicopters too!
reviews.author: Ryan Monaghan

reviews.title: The best sim on android
reviews.comment: Simply amazing where phones r up to now landing a 747 is just amazing worth every penny great work guy\'s
reviews.author: David Cowen

reviews.title: Perfect except....
reviews.comment: Bought a few planes and scenery and now have 400 megabites used on main phone memory. Was able to install app on sd storage but not planes ect. Developer might consider programming purchases to allow memory cards (external storage) to store purchased items. Would like to buy more airplanes but cant sacrafice more phone memory.
reviews.author: Richard callews

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: This is right there with x plane but I like this even better.
reviews.author: Will Frederick

reviews.title: Formidable
reviews.comment: Infinite Flight is worth the asking price. The aircraft and their liveries, as well as the physics/environments are all very well represented. The developers are clearly invested in making a good product and I look forward to future additions/improvements. I do wish the price tag weren\'t so steep for some of the extra aircraft, but I\'ve thus far enjoyed this game more than I do X-Plane.   I suggest adding Vancouver or Seattle as a locale, and perhaps a modern turbo-prop like the Q400.
reviews.author: Max Mitchell

reviews.title: Bugs but brilliant!
reviews.comment: This game is amazing, but I still have bugs and random crashes (mainly always happens when using the A380, or the Australia regions - Sony Xperia SP)  Keep up the brilliant work!
reviews.author: Ben Gardiner

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: No drop off from the game play found on iOS. Realistic in every aspect
reviews.author: Brad Darby

reviews.title: Best app ever! Samsung Galaxy tab 2
reviews.comment: If you\'re serious about flight and really love aviation, there\'s no better simulator on any mobile device that even comes close to this. I had this sim on my windows phone for a year and loved it, the android version for tablets feels even better.
reviews.author: Ikenna Ezea

reviews.title: No sound.
reviews.comment: Unable to download aircraft. Please fix soon. Thank you.  Edit: thank you for your hard work.....excellent stuff guys...back to five stars;) edit: please add lights to cockpit for night flying
reviews.author: Saeed Williams

reviews.title: Excellent if didn\'t crash
reviews.comment: Fantastic game. Very realistic apart from lack of buildings/terminals. Would be 5 \342\230\205 if you could fly LHR > MAN/DUB/ORK etc. However it crashes quite often...screen goes blank. Spent \302\24315...disappointed.
reviews.author: William Canty

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Having been an avid user of Microsoft\'s Flight Sim since the early days, I\'m amazed what the developers have been able to put on a cellphone.  Now that they\'ve got it working with my Nexus 10 tablet--just wow!
reviews.author: Jeffrey Dunn

reviews.title: Love it! But Expensive!
reviews.comment: 5 bucks for an Airplane??? HAHAHA... X Plane mobile has them for 99\302\242 each. And they also have engine failures, bird strikes etc. I don\'t mind paying, but when its all set in done it adds up to 70$+. Ridiculous! specially for an Android app... Ill just buy a good PC Simulator instead....
reviews.author: Jose Olivares

reviews.title: Excellent! But it has a big problem
reviews.comment: Im very happy this flight sim is the best well worth it i bought every Aircraft an region inside the sim after downloading everything it takes 780mb out of my internal memory which means i cant install more apps please fix this! Thanks a lott and i hope i can get a reply from you guys!
reviews.author: Enrique Gallegos

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Sound issue fixed! Awesome game!
reviews.author: Aaron Hall

reviews.title: Great game...however...
reviews.comment: A huge upgrade to this game would be the addition of random aircraft flying around,  taking off, and landing.  Maybe a few here and there...nothing like LAX. This game has HUGE potential to be a supplement to even PC flight sims if you enabled more interaction in the cockpit or were able to have emergencies. Oh...and C-17s fly backside meaning anything after 1/2 flap -- power = lift and pitch = speed. I would know since I fly them in the AF. THANKS GUYS!
reviews.author: Steven Fuhrman
